summary:
Always wanted to look like Catwoman?
Now you can!
And all this in a more lorefriendly way.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][center][size=2][color=#6d9eeb]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77254-8-1469103736.png[/img]
After I made the Harley Quinn preset and a Poison Ivy preset. This is the third Batman Villian I made for Skyrim.[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]So I made a Catwoman RaceMenu Preset this time.[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]This one was harder, not because her face is strange or something, but more like: What are Catwoman's special features?[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]She moves like a cat, fights like a cat and wears a catsuit.[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]But all those things have nothing to do with a RaceMenu preset.[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]Ofcourse, there is the Dark Knight version. But that one did not really catch my eye.[/color]

[color=#6d9eeb]After a few attempts I came to the conclusion that she does not have long hair (not extreme long)[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]So that helped.[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]I gave her some more make-up, so she looks more seductive.[/color]

[color=#6d9eeb]The idea of a RaceMenu Preset is very simple:[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]You can use this preset to make your character look like Catwoman[/color]

[/size][b][color=#9fc5e8][size=5]Permission[/size]
[/color][/b][color=#6d9eeb]I like the idea of a follower mod. Just like with Harley Quinn, I can not do that myself.[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]If one of you would like to make a follower mod, just contact me by sending a personal message.[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]Keep in mind that most of the features within this preset are from other modders.[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]So by making a follower mod, you will need the permission of the authors too.[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb](This for both the Required mods as the Recommended)[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]
[b][size=5]Requirements:[/size][/b][/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]RaceMenu[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]KS Hairdos[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]Fair skin complexion (with all the make-up features)[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]Stroja's Warpaints[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60769/?][color=#6d9eeb]http://www.nexusmods...im/mods/60769/?[/color]
[color=#9fc5e8]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77254-3-1469103736.png[/img]

[/color][/url][size=5][b][color=#9fc5e8]Reccomended [/color][/b]
[/size][color=#6d9eeb]For catwoman, I know a few mods that would make her look like a catwoman in a more lorefriendly way:

Calyps Animal Ears:
[/color][color=#6d9eeb]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14205/?
Midnightbreed Armor:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53697/?
Tembtra Thief Armor
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59451/?
[b]
For a more Catwoman like sneaking and running:[/b]
KISS - Khajit Cat Sprint and Sneak animations:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22604/?[/color]

[font=Georgia][b][color=#9fc5e8][size=5]I hope you will enjoy the mod![/size][/color]
[/b][color=#6d9eeb]Let me know what you think about this. [/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]I accept requests for any other female characters from comics or games. Just let me know![/color]

[color=#9fc5e8]
[/color][b][size=5][color=#9fc5e8]Check out my other mods![/color]
[/size][/b]
[color=#6d9eeb][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77093-7-1468523562.png[/img][/color]
[color=#3c78d8]
[/color][/font][color=#3c78d8][font=Georgia][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77093/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D77093%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Harley Quin[/url][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77093/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D77093%26preview%3D&pUp=1]n - Standalone Follower[/url]

And

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77040/?][font=Georgia]Harley Quinn - RaceMenu Preset
[/font][/url]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77225-7-1469020284.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77225?]Poison Ivy - RaceMenu Preset[/url][/color][/center][color=#6d9eeb]
[/color][/font]
author: Yourskyrim123
